dc:title: Random Reflections
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reflects on the enduring struggle to understand suffering love, penance, the joy and pain of our bodies, the beauty of a woman's body, and the example of the saints. Mentions numerous books she loves and some she doesn't care for.
